author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MILTON GROWING IN SIZE AS IT MOVES CLOSER TO THE WEST COAST OF  FLORIDA... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING WINDS, AND FLOODING RAINS  EXPECTED ACROSS PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AND SOUTHWESTERN FLORIDA...
summary:
...MILTON GROWING IN SIZE AS IT MOVES CLOSER TO THE WEST COAST OF  FLORIDA... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING WINDS, AND FLOODING RAINS  EXPECTED ACROSS PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AND SOUTHWESTERN FLORIDA...
 As of 2:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 9
 the center of Milton was located near 26.3, -84.0
 with movement NNE at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 944 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Milton (AT4/AL142024)
